summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1313, for the improvement of Twenty-second Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, from East Union Street to East Marion Street, by the construction of a sewer therein of proper dimensions and material, together with all necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 14959 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
